body.name: Gillette Venus Extra Smooth Charcoal Women's Razor Handle + 4 Blade Refills
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest Same-Day delivery Today 5 PM - 10 PM. Order within 9 hrs 30 mins
features: 5 BLADES: These women’s razors have 5 diamond-like coated blades with 60% more cutting power (vs Venus Smooth) for an extra smooth shave that lasts
LASTS UP TO 30 DAYS: Each blade refill lasts up to one month (based on twice/week shave); just use and replace when you're ready for a new one
METAL HANDLE: A durable, ergonomic metal handle molded for a comfortable grip designed to last
AVOIDS RUST: Venus blades are designed with several layers of coating to help avoid rust and to keep delivering a close, comfortable shave
WITH CHARCOAL. The water-activated ribbon of moisture brings a smooth glide to every stroke, closely cutting hair with ease
SHAVE EFFORTLESSLY: These razor blade refills have a pivoting head that ensures shaving precision in hard-to-reach areas. No awkwardly angling your razor
body.description: Venus female razor blades are designed with a woman’s body in mind. Venus Extra Smooth Charcoal women’s razors deliver a close, controlled shave. The razor blade refills have 5 blades for a super close shave, and the razor handle is an ergonomically molded metal handle for a weightier shaver grip. Each of this female razor's blades has a diamond-like coating to closely cut hair with ease, for extra smooth skin. These female razor blades cut hair closer to the skin, for a longer-lasting smooth (vs Venus Smooth 3 bladed razor for women). The blade’s water-activated ribbon of moisture helps protect from nicks and cuts. Each blade refill lasts up to one month (based on twice per week shave); just use and replace when you're ready for a new one. The razor blade refills have a pivoting head that adjusts to your curves, including ankles and knees. No awkwardly angling your razor. Did you know that any Venus blade refill fits any Venus razor handle (except Simply Venus and Venus Pubic Hair Razor)? Shave your way without buying a whole new Venus handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Charcoal is natural
reviews.reviewText: No bumps. No razor burn. No issues when using these razors. I also love the box they come in - better than plastic. I appreciate the natural aspect of the charcoal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Venus Platimum is BEST MEN's MACH3 Cartridge Razor! I keep razor, Wife keeps the Venus cartridges!
reviews.reviewText: I realize it is strange for a husband to review his wife's razor.My wife exclusively uses the Venus Extra Smooth Blade Cartridges and is amazed how smoothly they shave her legs. My wife prefers using the standard all plastic Venus razor with these cartridges because she likes the plastic razor's significantly lighter weight which makes it easier to control and results in less likelihood of razor nicks.When I lost my Mach3 razor while on vacation, I discovered my wife's Venus razor also fits the men's Mach3 cartridges! The splendid ergonomic shape of the Venus razor fits a hand better than ANY custom Mach3 razor I have ever used (e.g. Solid Chrome Metal Men's Razor for Gillette Mach3 Cartridge ) ! The only deficiency in using the standard women's plastic Venus razor as a man's Mach3 razor is that it is extremely light weight (similar to a plastic disposable razor) and a heavier weight razor is better at shaving a man's thick beard. When my wife saw this $8 deal on the heavier all metal Venus Platinum razor, she immediately ordered it because I get to keep the solid metal Venus Platinum as a Mach3 razor for myself and my wife gets to keep the two Venus Extra Smooth cartridges as refills for her standard plastic Venus razor.The Venus Platinum razor is made of a satin finished solid metal handle that has a 54g weight, the minimum weight needed for use as a man's Mach3 razor. Most custom men's razors are at least 10% heavier (closer to 60g) but in this case its slightly lighter weight is OK when matched with its ergonomic features. The ergonomic details of the handle's curved shape and flattened pommel are perfect for a palm's grip and provides finger rests for precise control of the razor while shaving a beard both DOWN and UP. The textured rubber component surfaces on the metal handle provide excellently placed finger grips for use with wet hands. The razor's head holds the Mach3 cartridge securely attached and the offset head angles the cartridge very well to avoid nicks while shaving. The razor's excess head-width is a superficial cosmetic glitch and is the only clue the Venus Platinum razor was not intended for use as a Mach3 cartridge razor (see photos).The Venus Platinum razor is the VERY BEST ERGONOMIC MEN'S MACH3 CARTRIDGE RAZOR available at any price! (Luckily my wife doesn't like the razor's significant additional weight or else I wouldn't get to keep it for myself!) And the Venus Extra Smooth Cartridges are the best available for shaving legs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very smooth shaving blades
reviews.reviewText: I really recommend these blades. They give an extremely smooth shave in all spots. Excellent quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Total Bad Ass Razor!
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Gillette Venus Platinum Extra Smooth Metal Handle Razor with 2 Refills for $10.97 ($12.97 minus the $2.00 coupon offered on Amazon). As my daughter and I often mix up our supplies, I was motivated to find a Venus razor with an appearance distinctively different from the regular blue one. Also, this one just looked super cool. Totally my style. Finally, a razor blade that doesn't look like a favor handed out at a Pink Sweet 16 Party.Once it arrived, I was happy to see that it has a solid metal appearance. It's not hallow plastic wrapped in a cheap silver foil. It actually seems like stainless steel and has some weight to it. After a month of regular use, the razor has maintained its original appearance.The Extra Smooth is now my #1 favorite blade type. It gives a super close shave. I have to use high quality razors and maintain aseptic technique (Eg: Change blades frequently, use different blades for body versus bikini region) as my skin is prone to ingrown hairs and razor burn. This blade works soooo well on my super sensitive skin! Much more so than the Venus "Sensitive" Blades. Even when I'm "speed shaving" in the early morning, I rarely slice my skin up with this blade. It also seems to dry well in between uses.As with all other Venus blades, I haven't been successful in getting the enclosed suction cup holder to work. It always falls down, regardless of the material I place it on. Instead, I place it vertically in my shower organizer caddy in order to allow it to fully dry in between uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty good product, but the shave just wasn’t as smooth as I was looking for and the razors didn’t last as long as I would have liked but they are still not bad razors. I’m not sure if I’ll purchase them again but even though they didn’t work so well for me they may work great for other people!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars feels good in your hand
reviews.reviewText: I love the weight of this razor. It is solid and the weight makes it less likely to slip out of your hands. I have used venus razors for a great many years and have had multiple styles. This is by far my favorate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Feels really nice in the hand! Way better than a plastic handle!
Vale la pena, muy cómodo y una manera más ecológica

I love everything about this razor. First and foremost, I was thrilled to find a Venus line razor with a metal handle. Despite the unnecessary amount of plastic packaging it comes in, the metal handle has weight to it and is wonderfully sturdy and of great quality; it really feels like it will last a lifetime and as such, I did not feel guilty buying it despite its more expensive price tag compared to the plastic Venus handles.As for the slipping that so many people have mentioned before me, I have not once had this issue. This handle actually sits in the hand very comfortably no matter what angle I hold it at, and overall I find it easier to grip than the plastic ones, thanks to the rubber pieces being placed in just the right areas.As for the blades themselves, to put it bluntly: I have never had a closer shave in my life. I only need to go over an area once and then I am on to the next. They leave my legs feeling beautifully soft and well moisturized; I have not had to apply lotion after shaving with the blades that this handle comes with. With that being said, I like that the attachment on the handle is compatible across the various Venus brand variety of blades. Although I can't imagine myself straying from the ones that came in this package, it is nice to know that I would not need to buy an entire new set - I can pick whatever blades I choose. But that goes for any Venus handle you purchase.
Me encanta que sea de 5 navajas por que hace una afeitada mas duradera y sin rastro de vello y dura mucho tiempo

Amazing! I wasn't expecting to find a metal handle! I've had my old, plastic Venus for years and finally dropped it on some tile the wrong way. It snapped and became somewhat dangerous to use. This metal handle is compatible with the heads I bought from Costco and seems very sturdy! The materials is environmentally friendly (even though the packaging isn't) and it should last for decades!My only complain is that it's heavier than the plastic one, but I think that's expected!
Las navajas esta bien afiladas, justo para que con una pasada quede bien
